attempts.raw_output:
I have enough context now. This is a UX enhancement request about making inheritance more intuitive — showing all inheritable properties on folders and defaulting new connections to inherit from parent. The upstream contributor already acknowledged both points and linked to existing enhancement issues (#238, #239).
